name: ilovedogwalks
desc: A freelance dog walking website for a small buisness in the UK. Made on top of a Node/Express server using bootstrap.

name: hackify
desc: A music platform powered by the spotify API. Built with a Node/Express and deployed with Heroku.

name: Fightapp
desc: Fightapp matches fighters from different gyms, taking into account many factors to create the closest and most even matches.
